title: [FSX/P3D] FlyLogic - Grenchen-Granges  X
description:
PLEASE SEED!! Enjoy! :D


Aviation:
There is a big part of taking place on the airport traffic
in the public interest : air taxi and business travel as well as
Flights to promote the flying young , professional pilots ,
Instrument flight and squad training.
The implementation of Jeff StÃƒÂ¤hli in FSX is terrific success.
Really every detail has been created in 3d and this in photorealistic
Manner . A real eye-catcher are the new manually created
Trees , shrubs and plants. The soil texture of 12 cm / pixel
accurately reflects all the characteristics of the soil structure. A landmark
from the Airport - the black Breitling Clock - shows the exact time.
The most distinctive landmark , however, is the IKARUS ,
the God of the pilots! As a gag is on the access road to the airport
set up a " speed Blitzer " - watch so on :-) .

Highlights:

Photorealistic representation from the airport Grenchen and the environment
Distinctive objects : AarebrÃƒÂ¼cken , highway Biel -Solothurn , indoor tennis courts
High-resolution photo textures of 3D models
Motorway extension direction Biel A5
Original layout of taxiways , parking positions
3d runway lighting
Static aircraft such as DA -42 and Antonov AN-2
Ground textures based on aerial images ( 12cm/Pixel orthophoto )
Seasonal coloring of the aerial images for summer and winter
Animated moving windsocks
Traffic along the airfield
3d trees in and around the airfield environment with seasonal textures
Complete very impressive night lighting
Optimum adaptation to the Switzerland Professional X
To print approach plates
